alert.note: Alert for Hoke; Montgomery; Moore; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 11:13PM EDT until June 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Moore County in central North Carolina... North central Scotland County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Montgomery County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Richmond County in central North Carolina... Northern Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1113 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Pinehurst, or 11 miles west of Southern Pines, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Carthage, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Hoffman, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Foxfire, Taylortown and Vass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
